name: Premium Service
description: Our premium service offering provides exceptional quality and attention to detail. Perfect for special occasions and important events. Fully insured and professionally managed to exceed your expectations.

name: Standard Service
description: Our reliable standard service provides excellent value without compromising on quality. Ideal for regular events and gatherings. Professionally delivered and maintained to ensure satisfaction.

name: Basic Service
description: Our essential service option provides great value for smaller events and occasions. Quality service with professional standards at an affordable price point.
